title: Days of the past;
author: Shand, Alexander Innes
snippet: Old Peter of Strathtay comes in somewhere between Craigie and M'Intyre.

title: The black watch.
author: Picken, Andrew
snippet: The sober twilight of tranquil summer had already thrown her grey mantle over hill and valley, obscuring the many pleasing objects in the rich carse of Strathtay, as the party wound through the irregular park of Waridow house, and drew near to the gaunt old mansion.

title: The black watch.
author: Picken, Andrew
snippet: No, Sir, I never, thank God ! was farther north than this carse of Strathtay."

title: St. Andrews and elsewhere;
author: Boyd, Andrew Kennedy Hutchison
snippet: Yes : it is a fine thing, if the heart be right, that you be what the tramp said in Strathtay.
